actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the Mutual Security Act of 1954 to require that information relating to foreign travel by Members of Congress be open to public inspection and published periodically in the Congressional Record.

summary.text: Requires that information relating to foreign travel by Members of Congress be open to public inspection and published periodically in the Congressional Record. (Amends 22 U.S.C. 1754)

titles.title: A bill to amend the Mutual Security Act of 1954 to require that information relating to foreign travel by Members of Congress be open to public inspection and published periodically in the Congressional Record.
